name: NiOh: Complete Edition
summary:
Ready to die? Experience the newest brutal action game from Team NINJA and Koei Tecmo Games. In the age of samurai, a lone traveler lands on the shores of Japan. He must fight his way through the vicious warriors and supernatural Yokai that infest the land in order to find that which he seeks. 
 
Steam Exclusive Bonus 
Enjoy wearing the "Dharmachakra Kabuto," a helmet exclusive to the Steam version of Nioh! You can claim yours by selecting "Boons" from a shrine.

esrb.synopsis: This is an action game in which players assume the role of a warrior swordsman (William) in pursuit of a villain during feudal Japan. As players traverse villages and ancient castles, they use swords, spears, longbows, and rifles to kill human enemies and demonic creatures in melee-style and ranged combat. Some attacks result in large sprays of blood as enemies are decapitated and/or dismembered; some areas also depict large smears of blood on walls and mounds of corpses on a battlefield. Cutscenes depict additional acts of violence: a man impaled through the chest with a crystal shard; a creature stabbed through the head with a sword.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 18 years and over only.
It contains: Extreme violence -
